name: Cryptocracy
description: Cryptocracy is a game that can make you sit up and take a notice about how our modern society is organized and who really runs it. If you have no problem with imagination, the game can show you who is behind the curtain… Of course, you will need help to understand it​ all, so here comes one former zillionaire and power broker, who was...
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1048 MB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Not neccessary
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
